mapper.select: SELECT sa.test_id AS testId, t.test_name AS testName, sc.student_username AS studentUsername, CASE WHEN sa.student_username IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS hasSubmitted, COUNT(sa.question_id) AS totalAnswered, SUM(CASE WHEN sa.selected_option = q.correct_option THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS correctCount, MAX(sa.answered_at) AS lastAnswered FROM student_class sc JOIN teacher_class tc ON sc.class_id = tc.class_id LEFT JOIN student_answers sa ON sa.student_username = sc.student_username LEFT JOIN questions q ON sa.question_id = q.question_id LEFT JOIN tests t ON sa.test_id = t.test_id WHERE tc.username = #{teacherUsername} GROUP BY sa.test_id, t.test_name, sc.student_username, sa.student_username ORDER BY sa.test_id, sc.student_username
